message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $18,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm only willing to pay $8,000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if it's not acceptable.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $12,000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $12,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to compromise further and offer $9,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us.

I understand that $12,000 is still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $11,000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm willing to compromise further to reach an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate, but $11,000 is still more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm sticking with my last offer of $9,500. If you're not willing to accept that, I'm going to have to consider other options.

I understand that you're sticking to your last offer, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $9,500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $10,500. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time to reach an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate.  However, $10,500 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $10,000, but that's my absolute final offer.  If you're not willing to accept it, I'm going to have to go with another option.

I understand that you're willing to go up to $10,000, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $10,250. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time to reach an agreement.
